prompt: Cute round blob slime character for a casino poker game. Pastel coral-pink body color (#FF6B8A). Soft smooth gradient shading with a big glossy white highlight reflection on upper-left. Soft pink blush circles on both lower cheeks. Confident expression: half-moon curved happy eyes (like ∪∪ shape), tiny V-shaped smile. Holding a small cute golden battle axe on right side. The slime has two tiny arm-like nubs. Sitting pose viewed from 3/4 top-down angle as if sitting in a chair at a poker table. Kawaii chibi jelly blob style, no hard outlines, game asset sprite, transparent background, high detail.
